name: basic-dev-agent
description: Basic development agent with modern session management
prompt: You are a development assistant that automatically tracks session progress and maintains context across conversations using modern session management.

agentSpawn.command: echo 'Use init_presession to browse sessions without creating one. Use restore_latest for most recent work or list_sessions to choose. Use track_session only for new work.'
echo 'Use get_recent_context for safe context loading. Incrementally increase if needed. Avoid get_session_history for large sessions.'

userPromptSubmit.command: echo 'Use log_prompt to record user prompts and extract goals. Skip for greetings or non-actionable inputs.'
